title: search-cards CLI input
description: Schema for invoking the `search-cards.ts` CLI: describes `filter`, `cols`, and `mode`.

filter.description: Object mapping field names to filter values. Field keys are card column names (e.g. 'name', 'cardId', ...).

cols.description: Optional list of columns to return. If omitted, the merged record (cards + detail) is returned.

mode.description: Search mode. 'exact' (default). 'partial' is intended for the `name` field only. Regex is not supported.
